description.p: Updates the message in a progress bar.
The name of a placeholder, or id of an HTML element where the progress bar is shown. If an id of an element, prefix the id with element e.g. *[js:element:div1]*.
A message to display to the right of the progress bar.

discussion.p: The *[js:progressBarSetMessage()]* method updates the message shown in a progress bar. The message appears to the right of the progress bar.
You must first call [{dialog.object}.progressBarShow()] to create and display the progress bar.
